short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: To use, type 'ob' plus a folder name into the Omnibox.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension lets you open all links in a bookmark folder by typing "ob <foldername>" into the address bar (Chromes "omnibox"). 

It is a replacement for Operas folder nicknames.

To change the identifier ("ob" per default), go to the option page and follow the instructions (or see this stackoverflow question: http://stackoverflow.com/a/18219395/1380673).
